page.title: 15Local concerns.
page.content: creates the profit rather than the margin per unit. Cheaper goods are regarded by small shops as a threat. The matter which hs occupied most space in a local newspaper (The St.Helens reporter) has been the proposed closure of local schools as responce to falling school rolls.It was proposed to merge Rainhihh high School with another in the area. Protest groups of parents and PTA (Parent Teacher Association) members were formed to "defend" the school, and the amalgamation will no longer take place. The influence of these 'action groups' upon the final decision is uncertain when compared to the more important party political decisions.
